messages.content: Thank you for calling Google customer service. This is Adam. May I know your name, please?
My name is Oliver, and I'm really frustrated right now. I need some answers about my Google Maps subscription payment!
I understand, Oliver. I'm here to help. Could you please provide me with some more details about the issue you're facing with the payment?
I've been charged twice for my Google Maps subscription this month! This is unacceptable. I need to know why this happened and how you're going to fix it.
I'm really sorry to hear that, Oliver. Let me check your account details to see what went wrong. Could you please confirm your account email address for me?
It’s oliver@example.com. I'm tired of dealing with these issues every month. Can’t you guys get anything right?

Thank you, Oliver. I'm pulling up your details now. I apologize for the inconvenience you've experienced. It looks like there was a system error that caused the duplicate charge. I will initiate a refund for the extra payment immediately.
You better. This is the second time this has happened. How will I know when the refund is processed?

I understand your frustration, Oliver. Once I initiate the refund, you should receive a confirmation email within the next 24 hours. The refund itself will be reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
Fine. But this better not happen again. You guys need to fix your system!
I assure you, Oliver, we are working on addressing these kinds of issues to prevent them from happening in the future. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, just make sure the refund goes through. That's all I need.
I will take care of that for you, Oliver. Thank you for your patience, and again, I apologize for the inconvenience. Have a good day.
